titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: The Netherlands
The Netherlands

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Documents of the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs transferred to the National Archives are open to the public. Documents not transferred to the National Archives are accessible only through an appeal under the Government Information Act.

div.head: Location
div.p: Prins Willem Alexanderhof 20 2595 BE Den Haag

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers may access the National Archivesâ€™ finding aids or visit them directly.
